name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
A results-driven Senior .NET Engineer with 8 years of experience specializing in high-performance applications development using **.NET**, **C#**, **ASP.NET MVC**, **ASP.NET Core**, **Entity Framework**, and **WebAPI**. Proficient in database management with **MS SQL Server**, **PostgreSQL**, and **Oracle**, I have a strong foundation in Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) principles and agile methodologies that facilitate continuous improvement within teams. My front-end expertise includes **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **CSS**, **SASS**, and **Angular**, enabling me to create dynamic user interfaces that are responsive and user-friendly.

In addition to my technical skills, I excel in mentoring and leading cross-functional teams, driving system architecture decisions, and fostering a culture of best practices in software development. I have successfully delivered enterprise solutions that prioritize compliance, performance, and scalability, leveraging tools and frameworks to enhance overall project efficiency.
